metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8972 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the ValidateMove function infrontend/move.cc in GNU Chess (aka gnuchess) before 6.2.4 might allowcontext-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large input, asdemonstrated when in UCI mode.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnuchess - 6.2.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnuchess package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.5-1').
